docs.lead_paragraph: One of the largest gatherings that ever crowded into the Madison Square Garden Concert Hall was assembled there last night at the meeting of the Armstrong Association, held to raise funds for the Tuskegee (Ala.) Normal and Industrial Institute, at which Bishop Potter, Morris K. Jesup, and William H. Baldwin, Jr., the Chairman of the Committee of Fifteen, made speeches and Paul Laurence Dunbar read several of his poems.

headline.main: FRIENDS' APPEALS FOR TUSKEGEE INSTITUTE; Enthusiastic Meeting at Madison Square Garden Concert Hall.

docs.abstract: Frohman's Stock Company Leading Lady; Contract Signed

docs.lead_paragraph: A little woman who has gone into the uphoistering business says that there never was work of any other kind as good for nervousness. She is a delicate-looking woman, slender and not over-strong, and the work is hard, but she is in love with her work, and says that in the fascination of it she forgets all personal ills, and that this is a world of sin and woe.
